availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Agnes Williamson. Father of Martha C. Williamson, Zach Williamson, Robert Williamson, Thomas Williamson, Berry Williamson, and William Williamson. Farmer in Wilson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Wilson County, District 13, p. 433A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton p. 96.
Find A Grave, "William Henderson Williamson (1808-1881)," Memorial #195179990, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/195179990 (accessed April 6, 2021).
